member.name: T:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.Smart.HxSmartPasteButton
member.summary:
Smart Paste is an intelligent AI-powered app feature that fills out forms automatically using data from the user's clipboard. You can use this with any existing form in your web app.
HxSmartPasteButton derives from SmartPasteButton and adds support for Hx-like Bootstrap styling.

member.name: P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.Smart.HxSmartPasteButton.Defaults
member.summary: Application-wide defaults for . Please note, the defaults are not shared with .

member.name: M:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.Smart.HxSmartPasteButton.GetDefaults
member.summary: Returns application-wide defaults for the component. Enables overriding defaults in descendants (use a separate set of defaults).

member.name: P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.Smart.HxSmartPasteButton.Settings
member.summary: Set of settings to be applied to the component instance (overrides , overridden by individual parameters).

member.name: M:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.Smart.HxSmartPasteButton.GetSettings
member.summary: Returns an optional set of component settings.
member.remarks: Similar to , enables defining wider in component descendants (by returning a derived settings class).

member.name: P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.Smart.HxSmartPasteButton.Icon
member.summary: Icon to render into the button.

member.name: P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.Smart.HxSmartPasteButton.IconPlacement
member.summary: Position of the icon within the button. The default is (configurable through ).

member.name: P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.Smart.HxSmartPasteButton.Color

Bootstrap button style - theme color.
The default is taken from ( if not customized).

member.summary: Custom CSS class to render with the <button />.

member.name: P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.Smart.HxSmartPasteButton.IconCssClass
member.summary: CSS class to be rendered with the button icon.

member.name: P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.Smart.HxSmartPasteButton.Spinner
member.summary:
Enables or disables the spinner.
Leave null if you want automated spinner. You can set an explicit false constant to disable (override) the spinner automation.

member.name: P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.Bootstrap.Smart.HxSmartPasteButton.CoreCssClass
member.summary:
Gets the basic CSS class(es) which get rendered to every single button.
The default implementation is "hx-button btn".
